---
title: "Large Social Survey Symposium 2024"
---

With the support of the [UK Data Service](https://ukdataservice.ac.uk/), the 2024 Large Social Survey Annual Symposium will take place on the 3rd May in the Iris Murdoch Conference Suite at the University of Stirling. 

Please reach out to us at mail.largesocialsurveys@gmail.com to submit an abstract to speak or attend as a delegate. We welcome submissions concerning large social survey data from all social scientists and on a range of topics.
